cause they told me i have to go NS next year the moment i turn 18
so like if i already go there for 1 year  then i take my O's  then do i return to finish NS or completely postpone it is my question
Closest I have heard is A levels. Have heard of cases of those retaking A levels during NS. None of them were my friends though  but there were of course stories about them online.
If I am not wrong  technically in NS  you are allowed to take leave to take an examination if you talk to your supervisor about it beforehand
But I think for this case  most common case I have seen is they complete NS and then do poly. I dont think is possible to go to poly after serving 1 yr of NS and then come back to NS again
